column1: Local Foods////Pretzel rolls fall into my category of "Why the hype
column2: yo?" foods. They're often too salty
column3: too dense and too bready. Well
column4: color me wrong on this one. This was the height of pretzel roll perfection. The outside was that of a crispy pretzel
column5: shattering beneath my teeth to reveal its yeasty soft interior. Pardon the florid aside there as it was unavoidable.
